definition[0]: to deliberately not tell someone all that you know about something
example[0]: I got the feeling he was keeping something back.
definition[1]: to not show your feelings, even though you want to very much
example[1]: She was struggling to keep back the tears.
definition[2]: to prevent someone from being as successful as they could be
example[2]: Fear and stereotypes have kept women back for centuries.
definition[3]: to not give or pay something that you were going to give
example[3]: They kept back some of his wages to pay for the damage.
